The body needs food to have energy to move, grow, and feel well. Nutrition is the process of getting the right kinds of food to give the body what it needs. Food has three main groups: fruits and vegetables, protein, and grains. Fruits and vegetables help us stay healthy and strong. They are good for our eyes, skin, and hair. Protein is important for building and fixing our bodies. We get protein from foods like meat, beans, and nuts. Grains are good sources of energy for our bodies. We get grains from foods like bread, pasta, and rice. When we eat a balanced diet with all three groups, we have the energy to do the things we like to do. We can run, play, and learn new things. We can also grow up strong and healthy.

Step 2: Select appropriate vocabulary and sentence structure.

Here's the paragraph:
Do you know what nutrition is? Nutrition is the food your body needs to stay healthy. It is the way your body gets the energy it needs to move, play, and grow. Food gives your body the strength it needs to run, jump, and think clearly. Just like a car needs gasoline to run, your body needs food to work properly. There are three main types of food: carbohydrates, proteins, and fats. Carbohydrates come from grains like bread, fruits, and vegetables. Proteins come from foods like meat, fish, and eggs. Fats come from foods like nuts and oils. When you eat a balanced diet with a variety of foods, your body gets the nutrition it needs. If you eat too much of one type of food, you may not get enough of the other types. That's why it's so important to eat a variety of foods every day.

Text:
Step 1: Think about how to explain 'nutrition' to someone reading at the Upper Elementary level.
Step 2: Select appropriate vocabulary and sentence structure.
Step 3: Write a paragraph of 200 words that follows your plan. 
Nutrition is the process of using food to give our bodies the energy we need to live. Food is made up of nutrients, like vitamins and minerals. These nutrients help our bodies grow and repair themselves. When we eat, our bodies take in the nutrients from the food and use them to keep us healthy. Our bodies need a balance of different nutrients to stay strong and healthy. This balance is like a recipe, and our bodies use the ingredients from the food we eat to make the energy we need. For example, carbohydrates give us energy to move and play, while proteins help us build strong muscles. Fruits and vegetables are packed with vitamins and minerals that help keep our bodies healthy. By eating a variety of foods, we can give our bodies the nutrients they need to stay strong and healthy. This is why nutrition is so important - it helps us live our best lives and feel our best.
